name: Montreal Biodome
location: 4777 Pierre-De Coubertin Avenue Montreal, QC H1V 1B3
details: The Montreal Biodome is a facility located at Olympic Park in the Mercier–Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighbourhood of Montreal, Quebec, Canada, that allows visitors to walk through replicas of four ecosystems found in the Americas.

name: Montreal Science Centre
location: 2 Commune Ouest Street Montreal, QC H2Y 4B2
details: The Montreal Science Centre is a science museum in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It is located on the King Edward Pier in the Old Port of Montreal. Established in 2000 and originally known as the iSci Centre, the museum changed its name to the Montreal Science Centre in 2002.

name: Rio Tinto Alcan Planetarium
details: The Rio Tinto Alcan Planetarium is the successor to the Montreal Planetarium, and is located in the Espace pour la Vie, near the Olympic Stadium and the Biodome in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The new installation has two separate theatres as well as exhibits on space and astronomy.

name: La Ronde Amusement Park
location: St. Helene Island, Montreal QC H3C 6A3
details: La Ronde is an amusement park in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, built as the entertainment complex for Expo 67, the 1967 World Fair. Today, it is operated by Six Flags under an emphyteutic lease with the City of Montreal, which expires in 2065. It is the largest amusement park in Quebec and second largest in Canada.

name: iSaute
location: 8700 Golf Blvd. Anjou, Montreal, QC H1J 3A1
details: A trampoline park focused on fun! Welcome to iSaute, a leader in family entertainment. Wall to wall entertainment, activities for all ages

name: Montreal Botanical Garden
location: 4101 East Sherbrooke Street Montreal, QC H1X 2B2
details: The Montreal Botanical Garden is a large botanical garden in Montreal, Quebec, Canada comprising 75 hectares of thematic gardens and greenhouses.

name: Dalmany Park
details: Parc Dalmany is a park for relaxing, taking in the natural scenery or enjoying outdoor activities.

name: Treetop Trekking
location: 45C Chem. du Sous-Bois, Mont-Saint-Grégoire, QC J0J 1K0
details: Then come try a treetop adventure in Quebec! A leisure sport conducted in a wooded area equipped with features, treetop trekking has you climb your way up

name: Westmount Public Library
location: 4574 Sherbrooke St W, Westmount, Quebec H3Z 1G1
details: Westmount Public Library is located within Westmount Park at 4574 Sherbrooke Street West in City of Westmount, Quebec, Canada. It was designed by Robert Findlay and opened in 1899.

name: Peek-A-Boo Activity Center
details: Art classes, Robotics/Coding/Programming, Music & Movement and other activities for children.
